product_name: The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket for men gives you two classics: a waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) rain shell and a removable stretch-fleece liner for 3-way versatility. Seam-sealed, waterproof, windproof shell can be worn alone on mild, rainy days or with the liner on colder, wet days. Liner is made of TKA Superstretch hardface fleece and is designed to be worn alone as well as under the shell. Shell provides a fully adjustable hood, brushed chin guard, rip-and-stick cuff tabs, adjustable hem and zippered hand pockets. Liner features self-fabric stretch cuffs and 2 zippered hand pockets. The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket for men is zip-in compatible with complementing TNF garments.
short_description: The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket for men gives you two classics: a waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) rain shell and a removable stretch-fleece liner for 3-way versatility.
